settings.title: Julie's Picks
settings.text: Bringing curated pieces from my table to yours.

settings.title: Welcome to Julie & Ev
settings.text: Artisanal craftsmanship from the world to your door.

settings.title: Artisanal craftsmanship from the world to your door.
settings.text: With over fifteen year's expertise in pinpointing upcoming international interiors trends, Julie & Ev are adept at curating the next must-have pieces and presenting them in innovative, inspiring ways. We've honed a keen eye for style coupled with a passion for outstanding quality to ensure each of our pieces withstands the test of time - in both design and craft. We've made it our mission to help make your home a beautiful and relaxing place to live.

settings.title: What We Do
settings.text:
❖ Luxury lifestyle and homeware providers.
❖ We travel the globe to find things that inspire and excite us.
❖ Our mission is to share our discoveries with you.
❖ Helping make your home a beautiful and relaxing place to live.

settings.title: Our Pilosophy
settings.text: Underpinning Julie & Ev is a passion for travel and exploration, alongside the determination to make a positive impact. We work with artisans across the globe, combining timeless design with natural materials. Whether it's a designer's distinctive style, a piece's character, or the inspiration behind its origins — there's continually more to tell than meets the eye.  Each item we curate has a story that's made for sharing.

settings.title: Our Story
settings.text:
"As far back as we can remember, we've had a passion for sharing the tastes, sounds, and joys of our travels with our friends and family. In the summer of 2020, we took the first step
towards a lifelong dream: to bring a tastefully curated collection to the world.  Through our professional work, honesty and integrity were embedded in us, but our parents taught us taste. From them, we learned to be humble and to share our joys with others.
From them, we've learned that simplicity and sophistication go hand-in-hand — in design, craft, and life.

Artisinal goods, hand-made pieces, unique materials, fibers derived from centuries-old know-how are all elements that inspire Julie & Ev today. Whether in glassware, tabletops, or something more remarkable - you'll find these inspirations curated in every item we provide." Evren Yenicag, Co-Owner

settings.title: Beauty Beyond the Visual
settings.text:
"Comfort is where the home is, where we genuinely can be ourselves. Beauty goes beyond the visual - how we treat others, how we carry ourselves, and the items with which we surround each other makes a profound difference in our lives. So much of living well and the joy of life is about self-worth. That's why it's crucial to inspire these values in our friends and family, combining moral and social responsibilities and helping them to find grace in the small things. The home is the perfect place for this inspiration."
Julie Paulino, Co-Owner

settings.title: Ethics and Responsibility
settings.text:
The relationship between a creator and their work forms a story that makes each product not a mass-produced item but an exclusively crafted piece. The traditional skills used by our
suppliers have been handed down from generation to generation. We value this ancient knowledge, and hope by presenting it to the world, we help to keep it alive — while bringing daily joy to your home. We’re also aware of the hardships faced by people around the world. To help make a positive impact, we offer 10% of our purchasing profit to a charitable organization chosen by you.

settings.title: Delight in the Art of the Travel
settings.text: Within the collection, you'll find pieces to make a statement and others that effortlessly complement your decor. Each item serves as both a reminder of travels past and to inspire the journeys ahead of you. Thriving on aesthetics and unparalleled craftsmanship, Julie & Ev's collection redefines luxury for the modern home.

settings.rt_text:
Finding a perfect gift for a friend, a family member, or a special someone is definitely not an easy feat. Whatever the occasion is, our gift guide is here to assist you in searching for that ultimate gift that your loved ones will surely adore and treasure for the rest of their lives.

Now that the holiday glee is already fast approaching, we will make gift-giving as easy as it is supposed to be.

We have a range of gifts that are narrowed down to different options as we know well that not everyone has the same personality.

settings.text_l_r: Our Gifts For the Classic provides a real classic setting for those who love timeless tabletop and accessories. This unique collection will surely help you find the perfect piece for your mom, grandma, and friends who love celebrating their classics and embracing their traditional style.

For fashion-forward people, this Gifts For the Stylish will be a hit. This collection comprises an array of beautiful items ranging from elegant trays to elegant vases, hand-embroidered napkins. They can instantly and effortlessly make a statement and your stylish friends will surely adore these pieces.

Arrive in full style and select from an array of beautiful items. Our selection of stylish gifts are guaranteed to leave a long lasting impression.

If you are looking for frugal gifts that offer the same top quality and style, our Gifts Under $200 collection is for you.

These beautiful gifts ideas offer a range of artisanal items ideal for the stylish tastemaker.

For your friends who love simplicity, find them a beautiful something in our elegant Gifts For the Minimalist collection.

Shop our inspired collection for the minimalist. Cool finds will make it easy to find the right gift for the selective eye.

For special events, surprise your hostess or host with the perfect gift in this Gifts For the Host collection. You are guaranteed to be invited again!

Wow your host or hostess with a distinctive gift and be merry together this festive season.

Another great option is to let them choose what they want from our collection and you can offer that by using our exclusive Gift Card. They will surely find it generous and sweet of you to allow them to choose from our curated must-have artisanal items.

All of the gift items are made with exquisite, intricate, and world-class craftsmanship from artisans across the globe. 

Share your brilliant discovery of artisanal crafts and products with the people you love! From modern items to more traditional ones, the choice is theirs.

settings.rt_heading: Artisanal craftsmanship from the world to your door.

We've made it our mission to help make your home a beautiful and relaxing place to live.

❖ Luxury lifestyle and homeware providers.
❖ We travel the globe to find things that inspire and excite us.
❖ Our mission is to share our discoveries with you.
❖ Helping make your home a beautiful and relaxing place to live.

Underpinning Julie & Ev is a passion for travel and exploration, alongside the determination to make a positive impact. We work with artisans across the globe, combining timeless design with natural materials. Whether it's a designer's distinctive style, a piece's character, or the inspiration behind its origins — there's continually more to tell than meets the eye.  Each item we curate has a story that's made for sharing.

"As far back as we can remember, we've had a passion for sharing the tastes, sounds, and joys of our travels with our friends and family. In the summer of 2020, we took the first step towards a lifelong dream: to bring a tastefully curated collection to the world.  Through our professional work, honesty and integrity were embedded in us, but our parents taught us taste.  From them, we learned to be humble and to share our joys with others.  From them, we've learned that simplicity and sophistication go hand-in-hand — in design, craft, and life.

Artisinal goods, hand-made pieces, unique materials, fibers derived from centuries-old know-how are all elements that inspire Julie & Ev today. Whether in glassware, tabletops, or something more remarkable - you'll find these inspirations curated in every item we provide." Evren Yenicag, Co-Owner

"Comfort is where the home is, where we genuinely can be ourselves. Beauty goes beyond the visual - how we treat others, how we carry ourselves, and the items with which we surround each other makes a profound difference in our lives. So much of living well and the joy of life is about self-worth. That's why it's crucial to inspire these values in our friends and family, combining moral and social responsibilities and helping them to find grace in the small things. The home is the perfect place for this inspiration." Julie Paulino, Designer, Design Consultant and Co-Owner.  For Julie's Interior Design portfolio, please visit Julie Paulino Design.

Mirrors are more than practical objects where you can check how gorgeous you look before going out. When beautifully made and placed, mirrors can amplify light and add a character to any room. That’s especially true if you get mirrors with French-designed plaster frames.

At Julie & Ev, we’re proud to offer gorgeous handcrafted plaster convex mirrors from Paris. Decorative and rich in history, these mirrors can make as much of an impact as a painting.

At Julie & Ev, it’s our lifelong mission to deliver artisanal craftsmanship from the world to your door. Over the years of travel and design experience, we’ve developed a keen eye for style and durability. Trust that these mirrors can withstand the test of time—both in design and craftsmanship. Order your French plaster mirrors today.

settings.text_overlay: The relationship between a creator and their work forms a story that makes each product not a mass-produced item but an exclusively crafted piece. The traditional skills used by our suppliers have been handed down from generation to generation. We value this ancient knowledge, and hope by presenting it to the world, we help to keep it alive — while bringing daily joy to your home. settings.title_overlay: Delight in the Art of the Travel
settings.text_overlay: Within the collection, you'll find pieces to make a statement and others that effortlessly complement your decor. Each item serves as both a reminder of travels past and to inspire the journeys ahead of you. Thriving on aesthetics and unparalleled craftsmanship, Julie & Ev's collection redefines luxury for the modern home.

settings.rt_text:
Thanks for visiting Julie & Ev.  For any inquiries, please contact us below.

For Collaborations please email us at info@julieandev.com.

Press inquiries:  press@julieandev.com

For returns and shipping questions, please refer to our Shipping Policy page.

For order inquiries: orders@julieandev.com

For more inspiration please follow Julie & Ev on Instagram @julieandev

Many say that traveling is about the journey, that might be true, however when it comes to visiting new places, for me, it's all about the destination. Above all, I have to confess that after taking numerous flights.... I have not overcome my fear of flying. To my defense, it goes against all-natural events. How can a massive motorized machine fly at such a high altitude and at such a fast speed? But why surrender to fear and never see new lands, taste new cuisines, and enjoy new sounds? Fear has never gotten anyone anywhere. You see where I’m getting..? Hence, our curated tailored tables.

settings.rt_heading: Delight in the Art of the Travel
settings.rt_text: Within the collection, you'll find pieces to make a statement and others that effortlessly complement your decor. Each item serves as both a reminder of travels past and to inspire the journeys ahead of you. settings.text_l_r: Escape to far and charming places with our travel inspired table settings.  An exclusive concept created by Julie and Ev and inspired on the art of travel.  Photo by Luca Lago.
Travel away to the charming country of Portugal and make your table setting a perfect interpretation rooted in culture.  Photo by Zhen Hu
Long summer afternoons, spent along the Amalfi coast while occasionally sipping an aperol spritz is what Dolce Vita is all about.  This table setting is inspired on Dolce Far Niente.  Photo by Flo P

settings.title: Exceptional Craftmanship
settings.text:
Artisanal goods, hand-made pieces, unique materials, and fibers derived from centuries-old know-how are all elements that inspire Julie & Ev today. Whether you're interested in glassware, tabletops, or something more remarkable - you'll find these inspirations curated in every item we provide. Peruse our

Tabletop offerings.

settings.title: Curated Gift Sets
settings.text: This matching gift set comes with a Hand-blown Italian glass pitcher and two drinking glasses.   Give the gift of excitement to that stylish friend who likes to entertain and live beautifully.

settings.title: Curated Gift Sets
settings.text:
Even if you can't celebrate together, you can enjoy the same beautiful setting. 

Send your loved ones our special whimsical collection, which includes our elegant Rooster Plates, made in Portugal, and woven table linens.

settings.title: Curated Gift Sets
settings.text: A great gift for anyone who loves to entertain, our set of hand-painted Italian plates and whimsical lemon glasses go perfect with the Italian lemon-infused dipping olive oil.
